sentences.en: Each member of OPEC would seek to maximize its own production.
sentences.cn: 石油输出国组织的每个成员国都寻求最大限度地提高本国石油产量。

sentences.en: He is a member of the Royal College of Physicians.
sentences.cn: 他是皇家内科医师协会的成员。

sentences.en: He is already a member of Britain's most exclusive club.
sentences.cn: 他已经是英国最高级俱乐部的成员了。

sentences.en: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
sentences.cn: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

sentences.en: He was now a teacher and a respectable member of the community.
sentences.cn: 他现在是一位教师，并且是社区内受人尊敬的一员。

sentences.en: He was the most highly paid member of staff.
sentences.cn: 他是员工中薪酬最高的。

sentences.en: It's amazing what we can re-member with a little prompting.
sentences.cn: 稍加提醒我们就能想起很多东西，真是让人惊奇。

sentences.en: Jacques Arnold has been a member of parliament since 1987.
sentences.cn: 雅克·阿诺德自1987年以来一直是议会议员。

sentences.en: She is clearly the most articulate and self-possessed member of her family.
sentences.cn: 显然，她是全家口才最好、最沉着冷静的人。

sentences.en: She is to stand as a Member of the European Parliament.
sentences.cn: 她将竞选欧洲议会议员。

sentences.en: She's 87 years old, and a one-time member of the Ziegfeld Follies.
sentences.cn: 她现年87岁，曾经是齐格菲尔时事讽刺剧团的成员之一。

sentences.en: Spain imposed levies on farm imports from non-member states.
sentences.cn: 西班牙对来自非成员国的进口农产品征税。

sentences.en: The accused is alleged to be a member of a right-wing gang.
sentences.cn: 据称被告是某右翼组织的成员。

sentences.en: The majority of union members voted in favour of a strike.
sentences.cn: 大多数工会成员投票赞成罢工。

sentences.en: The matchmaker has been an important member of Jewish communities for centuries.
sentences.cn: 数世纪以来，媒人一直在犹太人社区扮演着重要角色。

sentences.en: The offending comment was in fact a heckle from an audience member.
sentences.cn: 这番冒犯性的话实际上是一名观众的诘难。

words.tran_cn: 资格；成员资格；会员身分

phrases.tran_cn: n. 小组成员；团体会员
国会议员；下院议员；下议院议员
常任理事国；永久性成分
高级会员；资深成员；资深会员

trans.tran_cn: 成员；会员，分子，身体部位（尤指胳膊或腿），构件，部件
trans.tran_en: a person or country that belongs to a group or organization
